PropertyList.title: Horten 229 keys + notes
PropertyList.line: Dont Use Center Keys ("5" + "#") In Flight!
A flying wing has no such stability like aircraft's with empennage!
If u want to use Rudder u choose small spoiler at the wing tips.
When u use them too hasty, u may lose control! (specially at lowspeed)
Thats also the fact with nearly every fast/powerfull maneuvers !
This Plane dont likes hasty movements.... be gentle ;)
The FDM is enhanced with orig. datas! If u want the older one
U just need some practice and it'll work. Startup is already done,
brakes are on, if u have to abort the takeoff hit the red button!
2. Wait till exhaust temp reach 700 degr C (red mark)
3. Full power till exhaust temp has reached 900 degr C
(advanced airmens and womens can go further here
with point 5 in the next step )
(high grossweight: step 2/ nearly empty: no flaps)
3. No Aileron, No Rudder, before Wheels come off
4. Before u release parking brake now....
remind ur self to use brakes rather than rudder.....
2. Increase pitch to 10 degr before touchdown
3. (There has a braking chute to come)
4. bit tricky, for the begin try
